entry.title: In early July, Maker passed the RWA-009 proposal, which approved HV Bank as a new vault type with a $100M initial debt ceiling & targeting $1B in 12 m...
entry.summary: In early July, Maker passed the RWA-009 proposal, which approved HV Bank as a new vault type with a $100M initial debt ceiling & targeting $1B in 12 months. Are we starting to see Maker actually lending to HV Bank? 👀👇 Learn more about RWA-009 here: Sébastien Derivaux: Is that @MakerDAO lending to a regulated US bank? 👀👀👀👀👀

entry.title: 🏦A Senate bill, the Digital Commodities Consumer Protection Act of 2022, is being introduced today. TL;DR — the proposal is net positive, but it n...
entry.summary: 🏦A Senate bill, the Digital Commodities Consumer Protection Act of 2022, is being introduced today. TL;DR — the proposal is net positive, but it needs more definition clarity for devs, node operators, & individual traders to prevent overreach. See @valkenburgh's breakdown👇 Peter Van Valkenburgh: 1/ New Crypto Bill in Senate: read this thread or our post for the full download on what it does and what risks it poses to software developers and individual crypto users. https://www.coincenter.org/a-new-senate-bill-focuses-on-cryptocurrency-exchanges-heres-what-developers-and-users-should-keep-an-eye-on/

entry.summary: Re @0xPolygon @zksync 4/4 @Scroll_ZKP also launched the first of its kind zkEVM-based zkRollup. In a collaboration between the @PrivacyScaling at Ethereum's foundation. Scroll 📜: After over a year of building our zkEVM-based zkRollup in close collaboration with the @PrivacyScaling group at the Ethereum Foundation, we are releasing the pre-alpha version of Scroll for external testers! 📜 https://mirror.xyz/scroll.eth/XQyXDgyxoefag6hcBgGJFz8qrb10rmSU-zUBvY3Q9_A
